patthana5.1:8.1: Kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1

patthana5.1:11.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
